text: Hormoaning is an extended play by American rock band Nirvana. It was released on January 27, 1992 through DGC Records. It was only relased in Australia and Japan while the band were touring there. ==Track listing== #"Turnaround" – 2:21 #"Aneurysm" – 4:49 #"D-7" – 3:47 #"Son of a Gun" – 2:50 #"Even in His Youth" – 3:07 #"Molly's Lips" – 1:53 ==References== Category:Nirvana (band)
title: Hormoaning
